"To restore your previous purchase, please ensure you're signed into the device with the same Google (or Amazon) account that originally made the purchase. Make sure the app store is enabled and not restricted by any parental controls, and ensure you have an active Internet connection. You'll only have to do this once to restore your previous purchase."

Determines if the server should burn in subtitles when converting video depending on the subtitles format. Avoiding burning in subtitles will improve server performance. Select Auto to burn image based formats (e.g. VOBSUB, PGS, SUB/IDX, etc.) as well as certain ASS/SSA subtitles
Cinema Intros bring the theatre experience straight to your living room with the ability to play trailers and custom intros before the main feature.

The media is compatible with the device regarding resolution and media type (H.264, AC3, etc.), but is in an incompatible file container (.mkv, .avi, .wmv, etc.). The video will be re-packaged on the fly before streaming it to the device.

With Emby you can easily stream videos, music and photos to smart phones, tablets and other devices from your Emby Server.
Emby is designed to help you manage your personal media library, such as home videos and photos. Please see our {0}terms of use{1}. The use of any Emby software constitutes acceptance of these terms.

There was an error performing the requested operation. Your server is unable to contact our Emby Connect Server at {0}. Please ensure your server has an active Internet connection and that the communications are being allowed by any firewall or security software you have installed.

The username is already in use. Please choose a new name and try again.
There was an error reaching the Emby Connect server. Please ensure you have an active Internet connection and try again.

Metadata is refreshed based on settings and internet services that are enabled in the Emby Server dashboard.

Requiring a hash match will filter subtitles to include only those that have been tested with your exact video file. Unticking this will increase the number of matched subtitles, but will also increase the chances of mistimed or incorrect subtitle text.

"Use the D-Pad on your remote to enter a numeric password. Single-click a button for the first listed number or double-click for the second. e.g. Single-click 'up' for 1 or double-click 'select' for 5. Hold down for one second and release the 'select' button when finished or the left button to start over."
"* Hold the 'down' button down for one second and release if you have an alpha password or need a keyboard for entry"

With Emby Premiere, you get not only full functionality in this app (including Live TV access) but also a host of other features in both the server and other apps across your entire Emby environment.

Free access to some apps on other platforms, sync your content to supported mobile devices or the web client for offline viewing, enjoy a theatre experience with Cinema Intros, dress up your images with the CoverArt plug-in and much, much more. Try Emby Premiere today.

"Would you like to send a report to the developer?
This report is sent to a private site only accessible by key personnel of Emby LLC and may contain your Emby user name, your Emby server name, your device and operating system version and model information, as well as logged activity between this app and your Emby server. All information is used strictly for the purposes of locating this report and in order to solve problems in the app. None of this information is ever shared with any 3rd party.
If you do not agree with sending this information, do not send the log."
Show a highlight rectangle on the current item
Show Season Premieres on Home Screen

"This app has the ability to direct stream certain multi-channel audio formats. If your hardware does not support these formats, you may hear no sound when playing some items.
